description: Creates a new version of a slot type based on the $LATEST version of the specified slot type. If the $LATEST version of this resource has not changed since the last version that you created, Amazon Lex doesn't create a new version. It returns the last version that you created. When you create a version of a slot type, Amazon Lex sets the version to 1. Subsequent versions increment by 1. For more information, see  versioning-intro. This operation requires permissions for the lex:CreateSlotTypeVersion action.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The name of the slot type that you want to create a new version for. The name is case sensitive.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the slot type.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the slot type.

nested_items.name: enumerationValues
nested_items.description: A list of EnumerationValue objects that defines the values that the slot type can take.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date that the slot type was updated. When you create a resource, the creation date and last update date are the same.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date that the slot type was created.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version assigned to the new slot type version.

nested_items.name: checksum
nested_items.description: Checksum of the $LATEST version of the slot type.

nested_items.name: valueSelectionStrategy
nested_items.description: The strategy that Amazon Lex uses to determine the value of the slot. For more information, see  PutSlotType.

nested_items.name: parentSlotTypeSignature
nested_items.description: The built-in slot type used a the parent of the slot type.

nested_items.name: slotTypeConfigurations
nested_items.description: Configuration information that extends the parent built-in slot type.

nested_items.name: regexConfiguration
nested_items.description: A regular expression used to validate the value of a slot.

nested_items.name: pattern
nested_items.description: A regular expression used to validate the value of a slot.
